title: Who is the voice actor of this game character (link included)? - Quora

response.answer_text: The game in question is Thea 2: The Shattering, and according to the IMDB credits, only two people are listed in the cast section. Since one of those is a woman, I'm going to assume the one you want is Simon Alison, who is credited for ‘Narrator and Miscellaneous Characters’ Interestingly, he also voiced ALL the characters in the first Thea title, so they clearly liked him!
